description: Monitor the observability of specific [AWS RDS Instance](https://aws.amazon.com/rds/).

environment_variables.description: IP address or domain name of your RDS instance.
environment_variables.name: METRIST_AWSRDSPERSISTENT_ADDRESS

environment_variables.description: Use 'postgres' or 'mysql'. If undefined, the monitor will default to mysql. [Contact us to support other engines.](https://metrist.io/contact/)
environment_variables.name: METRIST_AWSRDSPERSISTENT_ENGINE

environment_variables.description: Port number to access your database.
environment_variables.name: METRIST_AWSRDSPERSISTENT_PORT

name: AWS RDS Instance

steps.description: This step attemps to ping your postgres or mysql RDS instance.
